#summary HColorPicker widget information
= Introduction =

It's a simple office like drop-down color picker

[http://lh3.ggpht.com/fr.daniil/SDK_juwa6WI/AAAAAAAAACg/iwvd4Ku3zhk/color-picker.jpg]



----

Methods:
_ none _

Properties:
|| _ Gdk.Color _ || * Color * || gets/sets the current selected color ||

Events:
||_ ColorChangeEventHandler _|| * ColorChange * || - raised when the selected color changes ||

----



= Details =

  * To get or set the Color use the Color property
{{{
   colorPicker.Color = new Gdk.Color( 255, 0, 125 );
}}}
